price.faq_detail: Explore our comprehensive FAQ to find quick answers to common inquiries. If you need further assistance, don't hesitate to contact us for personalized help.

marketing.title: Automate your digital presence for solopreneurs with
marketing.sub_title: SoloFlow is a full-stack SaaS that automates web content creation and distribution. Take a photo, add a comment, and automatically publish to your website and social media.
marketing.sub_features: Intelligent solutions tailored for solopreneurs, micro-entrepreneurs, and artisans.

right_side.deploy_on_vercel_desc: Drag & drop or direct camera capture for easy content upload.
right_side.ship_on_cloudflare_desc: Generate optimized content descriptions using GPT-4o.
right_side.showcase_desc: One-click publishing to Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Telegram.

features_grid.monorepo_desc: Support for drag & drop upload and direct camera capture. Intelligent image processing with automatic size and quality optimization.
features_grid.i18n_desc: Use Google Vision API and GPT-4o to automatically generate optimized content descriptions and tags.
features_grid.payments_desc: Automatically publish to Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Telegram, and other major social media platforms.
features_grid.nextauth_desc: Features Neumorphism design style, providing a modern elegant user interface and smooth user experience.

people_comment.desc: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what real solopreneurs are saying about SoloFlow.
